channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Avro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Avro

item.title: CVE-2021-43045|2024-08-04T03:47:13.525Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20avro
item.description: A vulnerability in the .NET SDK of Apache Avro allows an attacker to allocate excessive resources, potentially causing a denial-of-service attack. This issue affects .NET applications using Apache Avro version 1.10.2 and prior versions. Users should update to version 1.11.0 which addresses this issue.
